title: Did the 17-year-old Scout Eagle build a nuclear reactor in his mother's backyard?
subtitle: The story of David Han, who got a merit badge in atomic energy and then turned his backyard into a superfund site while trying to build a nuclear reactor there.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: In 1994, the 17-year-old Scout Eagle built a nuclear reactor in his mother's backyard, an act that ultimately required the cleaning of SuperFund.
